location_machine_xrefs.condition: Machine is in working condition and most targets do work however the right flipper is stuck in an up position.

machine_conditions.comment: Machine is in working condition and most targets do work however the right flipper is stuck in an up position.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Super sensitive tilt. Some of the sunken playfield targets don't work.

machine_conditions.comment: Super sensitive tilt. Some of the sunken playfield targets don't work.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: There is a wire hanging down under the upper ramp after ball is plunged!

machine_conditions.comment: There is a wire hanging down under the upper ramp after ball is plunged!

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Game went to test mode two times in a row before any balls launched.  All credits lost and machine was subsequently turned off.

machine_conditions.comment: Game went to test mode two times in a row before any balls launched.  All credits lost and machine was subsequently turned off.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Message “4 balls missing” this credits were worthless.  Machine subsequently turned off.

machine_conditions.comment: Message “4 balls missing” this credits were worthless.  Machine subsequently turned off.
Wonderfully kept up machine. Needs the GI fixed in the upper part of the playfield. Too dark now.
Leans left, so watch that outlane!
There’s a kickout in the upper right that the ball can bounce in and out of for a while, but it eventually came free. Otherwise, the table played great!
Right flipper button was very sensitive and not very springy, but it was playable

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Super bouncy flipper rubbers makes this one pretty darn tough. Great game though.

machine_conditions.comment: Super bouncy flipper rubbers makes this one pretty darn tough. Great game though.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Not playing well. There are phantom hits to Rudy, which of course will help your score, but that's not the way it was meant to play.

machine_conditions.comment: Not playing well. There are phantom hits to Rudy, which of course will help your score, but that's not the way it was meant to play.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: UNLIMITED FREE PLAY!!! I REPEAT, UNLIMITED FREE PLAY!!! Machine is in poor condition, hard to hear sounds, ball gets stuck in Sparky's foot. But... free!!!

machine_conditions.comment: UNLIMITED FREE PLAY!!! I REPEAT, UNLIMITED FREE PLAY!!! Machine is in poor condition, hard to hear sounds, ball gets stuck in Sparky's foot. But... free!!!

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Doesn't play well. Weak flippers (and not just in that mode!), and could use some cleaning.

machine_conditions.comment: Doesn't play well. Weak flippers (and not just in that mode!), and could use some cleaning.
Such a great game, but this machine needs some tlc. Weak R flipper. Also, the usual TWD problem with ball draining sdtm when it comes out of the pops. Can be remedied with a little post rubber.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Plays well. Maybe the tilt is a tad too tight for casual play.

machine_conditions.comment: Plays well. Maybe the tilt is a tad too tight for casual play.

name: Hotel McCoy
description: Hotel McCoy is a newly remodeled hotel designed to have the look and feel of a 1960s hotel with modern amenities. Pecos Pinball operates a 1974 Williams Super-Flite, located in the lobby near the pool, outdoor ping pong table and other recreational ameni
